data.enText: severe action taken to restrict the activities of criminals or of people opposed to the government or sb in authority
a military crackdown on student protesters
data.chText: 对抗议的学生实行的军事镇压

example.ex: ...anti-government unrest that ended with the violent army crackdown.
example.tran: 最终被军队严厉镇压的反政府动乱

value.def: A crackdown is strong official action that is taken to punish people who break laws.
